headline: Jake Paul-Anthony Joshua fight almost cost DraftKings $100 million. Everyday bettors lost instead.
summary: Sportsbooks have been having a tough year — but the Paul-Joshua fight was a good night for the house.

headline: AMC’s stock sinks to a 6th straight record low, as ‘Avatar’ sequel’s big opening fails to impress
summary: AMC Entertainment’s stock falls to a sixth straight record low, after the disclosure of another debt-agreement amendment that involves the sale of shares.

headline: Sorry, winning Powerball’s $1.6 billion jackpot won’t make you a billionaire. Here’s why you may end up with $120,412,700.
summary: Various factors can reduce a lottery prize, from taxes to even the cost of a limo ride.

headline: Nike gets named a top pick at Jefferies — plus, what's next for Starbucks stock
summary: Every weekday, the Investing Club releases the Homestretch; an actionable afternoon update just in time for the last hour of trading.

headline: Dollar is finishing a difficult year with a ‘golden cross’ — suggesting the worst might be over
summary: The U.S. dollar has had a rough go of it in 2025 — but one recent development indicates that the beaten-down buck could be due for a bit of a reprieve in early 2026.

headline: Powerball's $1.6 billion jackpot is its fourth largest ever—here's the after-tax payout in every U.S. state
summary: Powerball's jackpot has grown to the fourth largest ever in U.S. lottery history.

headline: A closely watched gauge of bond-market volatility is signaling all-clear for stocks
summary: November wasn’t exactly a great month for the U.S. stock market, although the S&P 500 did manage to eke out a small gain. So far, December is shaping up to be only modestly better.

headline: Who claims Social Security while they are still working — and why do they do it?
summary: Social Security was originally intended for retirement

headline: The AI power scramble intensifies with Alphabet’s purchase of data-center partner Intersect
summary: With energy becoming a critical AI bottleneck, Google’s $4.75 billion acquisition of Intersect is a move to secure power for its data centers

headline: A Starlink rival’s stock is surging again, as space stocks stay red hot
summary: AST SpaceMobile, which has inked agreements with more than 50 mobile network operators, is set to launch its next-generation satellites on Tuesday.

headline: GDP looks strong despite a turbulent year. Can the U.S. economy keep it up?
summary: The kitchen sink was thrown at the economy in 2025 — punishing tariffs, higher inflation, rising unemployment — but the U.S. might still be growing at an above-average speed in a sign of surprising pluck.

headline: Jim Cramer is encouraged by Nvidia-China reports and dismisses a Honeywell charge
summary: The Investing Club holds its "Morning Meeting" every weekday at 10:20 a.m. ET.

headline: This shipbuilder’s stock is soaring to a fresh record as company wins contract to produce a new type of Navy frigate
summary: Shares in military shipbuilder Huntington Ingalls Industries were up sharply Monday, building on Friday’s surge that came after the U.S. Navy announced it had selected the company to design and build a new class of small warship.

headline: The NBA is pursuing ownership groups for a potential basketball league in Europe
summary: The NBA is exploring the launch of a new professional men’s league in Europe in partnership with FIBA.

headline: ‘I don’t want to break up with him’: I’m 32 and my boyfriend wants me to move to Israel. Do I go?
summary: “I truly see a future with him, but I’ve never imagined myself living in Israel.”

headline: These elite investments can now be yours — just think twice before saying yes
summary: Hedge funds on average underperform a basic 60/40 stock-bond portfolio.

headline: Waiting until January to make this move could trim up to $2,000 off your taxable income—about 90% of filers could benefit
summary: The "big beautiful" budget bill created a $2,000 above-the-line deduction on charitable donations for tax year 2026.

headline: Jim Cramer's top 10 things to watch in the stock market Monday
summary: The S&P 500 was headed for a higher open to kick off the holiday-shortened trading week.

headline: Paramount says Larry Ellison now personally guarantees $40 billion of the Warner Bros. bid
summary: Larry Ellison now provides a “personal guarantee” of $40 billion of the financing for Paramount’s $108 billion offer to buy Warner Bros. Discovery.

headline: Brick trophies, a life-size pink Cadillac and a team sponsorship: Why Lego is going all in on F1
summary: Lego and Formula 1 kicked off a multiyear partnership in 2025. Here's how that collaboration is providing value to the toy company and the racing organization.

headline: Okta CEO Todd McKinnon has words of caution for people jumping ship to work at AI startups
summary: Why it’s not always smart to jump ship for a flashy job offer

headline: Honeywell says it has a $470 million Flexjet problem, and a lowered profit outlook
summary: Honeywell expects to make a one-time cash settlement payment of $470 million related to the Flexjet lawsuit — and the stock drops.

headline: Young crypto bros love to gamble — and you’ll never guess where they get the money
summary: Crypto holders with college degrees and full-time jobs gamble at much higher rates than non-holders.

headline: How Paramount beats Netflix, wins Warner Bros. and saves Hollywood from Big Tech
summary: This fight is about much more than money.

headline: Here are the macro surprises that Morgan Stanley says could trip up investors next year
summary: Morgan Stanley analysts across various products identify areas where they think the market consensus may be proven wrong.

headline: How this commodity trader is preparing for a second wave of inflation
summary: A similar pattern to the 1970’s may be on the cards, says this former commodity trader

headline: ‘Springsteen’ star Jeremy Allen White on his favorite reality shows and obsession with real estate
summary: The actor says he likes to “decompress” by perusing properties he knows he’ll likely never buy.

headline: The so-called ‘great debasement trade’ is back on as gold sets fresh record, says this strategist
summary: A rise in geopolitical tensions and the search for inflation hedges are fuelling the surge in precious metal prices

headline: Clearwater Analytics went on a buying spree. Now it’s getting bought in an $8.4 billion deal.
summary: Clearwater Analytics over the weekend agreed to a buyout from private-equity firms, after the stock market failed to reward a string of acquisitions the fund management accounting software provider made.

headline: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
summary: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”
